lead_paragraph: FC Dallas goalkeeper Dario Sala was suspended six games and fined $3,500 by Major League Soccer yesterday for violent conduct after a playoff loss Saturday to the Colorado Rapids. After Pablo Mastroeni scored on the Rapids’ final kick as Colorado defeated FC Dallas, 5-4, on penalty kicks, Sala punched Colorado players Hunter Freeman and Jovan Kirovski while they celebrated.
